DataElement.preferredName: Unit of Use Unique Device Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An identifier assigned to an individual medical device when a UDI (Unique Device Identifier) is not labeled on the individual device at the level of its unit of use, its purpose being to associate the use of a device to/on a patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An identifier assigned to associate the use of a device on a patient. This is for use when a UDI is not assigned to the individual device at the level of its Unit of Use. For example, a Unit of Use DI would be assigned to an individual electrode when the electrode is distributed in a package of 10._The procedure of having an identity established.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An identifier assigned to associate the use of a device on a patient. This is for use when a UDI is not assigned to the individual device at the level of its Unit of Use. For example, a Unit of Use DI would be assigned to an individual electrode when the electrode is distributed in a package of 10.

Concepts.definition: An identifier to associate the use of device on a patient when the Universal Device Identifier is applied to a package of multiple devices.

Property.preferredDefinition: Identified; having the identity known or established.

Concepts.definition: The procedure of having an identity established.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An object needed to perform a diagnostic, therapeutic or research activity.

DataElementConcept.origin: FDA: FDA GUDID (Global Unique Device Identification Database)
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Curated to support FDA GUDID project.  Released in order to use with AHRQ Common Format CDEs project.1.2017.dmr

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A unique numeric or alphanumeric code that contains the device identifier and a production identifier such as the lot or batch number, the serial number and/or expiration date.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An object needed to perform a diagnostic, therapeutic or research activity.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A unique numeric or alphanumeric code that contains the device identifier and a production identifier such as the lot or batch number, the serial number and/or expiration date.

Concepts.definition: A unique numeric or alphanumeric code that contains the device identifier and a production identifier such as the lot or batch number, the serial number and/or expiration date.
